name: Global Uniques
unitUniques: [This Unit] heals [1] HP <upon turn end> <if it hasn't used other actions yet> <when below [25] HP> <for [Water] units>

[This Unit] heals [1] HP <upon turn end> <if it hasn't used other actions yet> <when below [50] HP> <for [Water] units> <in [{non-[Friendly]} {non-[Enemy]}] tiles> <in tiles adjacent to [{non-[Enemy]} {Coastal} {Land}] tiles>
